summary: 16 more minutes of additional Skyrim Music by an obnoxious Belgian.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- NOTICE - [/b]

This mod is out of date, please head to the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28951] Additional Music Project [/url], thank you :). 

I\'ve uploaded a zip containing the esp and the required files, which should be unzipped to Data/Music/Additional Music Pack II. The esp goes in the data folder. 

It works over here but I\'m going to need some help testing it. At this point I have no idea on compatibility issues, but not expecting any trouble. It\'s a possibility the tracks aren\'t playing frequently enough, if so, let me know. Any other suggestions are also welcome. 

The downside of this version is that you cannot change when or where the music is played, for that see below. 

[b]- INTRODUCTION - [/b]

So, it\'s time for part two. If you missed part one, go [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15987]here[/url]. 
To play these tracks ingame you need [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13286]Personalized Music Mod[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15024]SkyRadio[/url], unless you use the esp. 

With 3 combat tracks, you could say this is the most agressive pack yet. Two regular combat tunes and a dragon combat tune. As ever, the whole pack can be listened to on [url=http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL1882B76E89DD57A1]Youtube[/url]. Tracks 6 to 10 of the Arne\'s Musical Adventures in Skyrim playlist are the ones featured in this pack. Two tracks will be in the video section as well. 

- Edit May 13th: added a YT link for every track in the contents section (accessibility ftw!)


[b]- AVAILABLE PACKS - [/b]

ESP PACK

Check the notice section :).

WAV PACK

For Skyradio and Personalized Music Mod (3.0 or below) users.

XWM PACK

For Personalized Music Mod 4.0 users.

MP3 PACK

For those who want to use these in Oblivion or listen to them on mediaplayers.

[b]- CONTENTS - [/b] (You can use the tracks in ANY folder, what follows is where I\'ve put them) 

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LgVDEXlIk9E]01 - Frostfall[/url]
Exploring, any kind

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-12d3DsVwtM]02 - I\'ll Have Your Head[/url]
Combat, regular

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=agETmOYoTW8]03 - For Old Time\'s Sake[/url]
Combat, regular

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qHxHkecgoig]04 - Trial By Fire[/url]
Combat, dragon

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KYpulxsLI34]05 - It Crawls[/url]
Dungeons \'n caves


Enjoy, I hope ;).

[b]- SPECIAL THANKS - [/b]

No_Aardvarks_Allowed for the great tutorial!
author: EvilBlueKoala
